results.title: Effect of metformin and rosiglitazone in a prepubertal boy with Alstrom syndrome.
results.text_hl: Effect of @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ and @CHEMICAL_Rosiglitazone @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000077154 @@@rosiglitazone@@@ in a prepubertal boy with @<m>DISEASE_Alstrom_Syndrome</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D056769 @@@Alstrom syndrome@@@.
